about_the_game:
You are L-064N and have just woke up in ION without any memories...

Year 2155, life on the face of the earth has become unsustainable: the environmental state is deplorable. In order to survive, humans must transfer their souls into a robotic body developed by the large neurotechnological company ION. After an accident, the protagonist L-064N wakes up in one of the robotic bodies with absolutely no memory of anything, with the only information being that ION rescued him in a pitiful state. Now his mind and soul are in an droid without the ability to communicate, but with other functions technologically far superior to those of his human body.





Recover your memory and find out what ION is up to

To recover your memory, you will have to pass a series of trials designed by Aura (a super-developed AI) from ION's facilities, you will be able to explore different aspects of your memories, such as ideas, personality or feelings. Likewise, L-064N will acquire or improve different skills, which will allow him to explore and solve the different tests simulated and implemented in his psyche by Aura.

Discover the story of L-064N!, learn the immense wisdom of Aura through the trials, discover characters with diverse histories, strive to overcome the challenges that ION faces to recover your memory, and find clues that will help you understand the enigmatic world of System of Souls while solving complex puzzles that will not leave you indifferent.



Features:

  • An intriguing and immersive narrative: Uncover the truth behind the mysterious ION complex, unmask the truth about the artificial intelligence Aura and recover your memory and discover who you really are in this fast-paced story full of twists and surprises.

  • Original mechanics: Elaborate puzzles that will surprise you and that will make you look for the most ingenious way to solve the different challenges that you will find throughout System of Souls.

  • Progressively increasing difficulty: The game experience will adapt progressively to the player's ability to solve the various puzzles that will be presented in the title, maintaining a difficulty curve and a satisfactory gaming experience for everyone.

  • Oppressive atmospheric scenarios: In System of Souls you will enjoy a multitude of Sci-Fi themed scenarios as you explore the variety of rooms that await you in the ION complex that will surely not leave you indifferent.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950

short_description: SoS is a puzzle and first-person platform game, where you play as L-064N, who wakes up in The ION laboratory, place where you will have to go through different logical trials created by the artificial intelligence of the place, in order to recover memories and understand this enigmatic world.
